Title: Relates to implementing transfer assessments for certain classes of property in a city with a population of one million or more
Summary: Implements transfer assessments for any class one or class two parcel in any special assessing unit wholly contained within a city which has had a transfer of title within the fiscal year where the market value of such parcel, as determined by the New York city department of finance, is greater than the assessed value of such parcel.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to implementing transfer assessments for certain classes of property in a city with a population of one million or more
